key.name: server-url
key.description: The URL of your Immich server (e.g., https://immich.example.com)

key.name: change-interval
key.description: Time in seconds between wallpaper changes (default: 1800 = 30 minutes)

key.name: album-id
key.description: ID of the album to use for wallpapers (empty = all albums)

key.name: picture-options
key.description: How to display the wallpaper: zoom, centered, scaled, stretched, spanned, wallpaper

key.name: background-color
key.description: Color to display around photos (when photo doesn't fill the screen)

key.name: show-location
key.description: Display photo location if available from EXIF data

key.name: map-provider
key.description: Which map service to use: openstreetmap or googlemaps

key.name: show-panel-icon
key.description: Show an icon in the top panel with photo information
